Gareth P. Jones is an English children's writer, and author of the Dragon Detective Agency series of books.He is best known for his comic-gothic book The Considine Curse, which won the Blue Peter Book Award in 2012, and for The Thornthwaite Inheritance. He also writes a series of books called Ninja Meerkats.
As well as being an author, Gareth works as a TV producer.

The Thornthwaite Inheritance is a children's macabre crime novel by British author Gareth P. Jones. It was published in 2009.
